title: Imperial Presidency Passage Relate to Scenario

content.question: Which of the following situations best reflects the author’s concern about an “imperial” presidency?

choices.label: The Senate ratifying treaties without executive approval
The president issuing an increasing number of executive agreements
Congress declaring war independent of the president
The president appointing a new secretary of education

content.answer: The president issuing an increasing number of executive agreements

topic.text: 2.4: Roles and Powers of the President

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how the argument or perspective in the source relates to political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
